A metallic taste in your mouth after eating is a sign of a food allergy. Although most food allergies cause mild to moderate reactions, a metallic taste in your mouth might be a sign of a severe allergic reaction. Stop eating foods that cause this reaction to occur and make an appointment with an allergist to discuss tests and treatment options.
